mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD (USER_IDX, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})

INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD_IMAGE_FILE (USER_IDX, BOARD_IDX, BOARD_ORIGINAL_IMAGE_PATH, BOARD_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_PATH) VALUES (#{user_idx}, last_insert_id(), #{boardOriginalImagePath}, #{boardThumbnailImagePath})
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD_FILE (USER_IDX, BOARD_IDX, BOARD_FILE_PATH) VALUES (#{user_idx}, last_insert_id(), #{boardFilePath})
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, USER_IDX, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, IMAGE_WHETHER, FILE_WHETHER, VIDEO_WHETHER, CREA_TIME FROM TBL_BOARD ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT TB.IDX, TB.USER_IDX, TB.WRITER, TB.TITLE, TB.CONTENT, TB.VIEWS, TB.CREA_TIME, TUF.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD AS TB INNER JOIN TBL_USER_PROFILE AS TUF ON TB.USER_IDX = TUF.USER_IDX WHERE TB.IDX = #{idx} AND TB.USER_IDX = #{user_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_board where idx = #{board_idx} and user_idx = #{user_idx} and writer = #{writer}
delete from tbl_board_file where board_idx = #{board_idx} and writer = #{writer}
delete from tbl_board_image_file where board_idx = #{board_idx} and writer = #{writer}
delete from tbl_board_file where board_idx = #{board_idx} and writer = #{writer} and board_file_path = #{boardFilePath}
delete from tbl_board_image_file where board_idx = #{board_idx} and writer = #{writer} and board_image_file_path = #{boardImageFilePath}
